ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: A significant increase or decrease in customer registration shows that there has probably been a change to your shop. With that in mind, we suggest that you identify the cause, correct the issue and get back in the business of making money!
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mijozlarni ro'yxatga olishning sezilarli darajada ko'payishi yoki kamayishi shuni ko'rsatadiki, do'koningizga o'zgargan bo'lishi mumkin.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Adds a registration progress tab to the Stats dashboard.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Statistikaning boshqaruvi paneliga ro'yxatdan o'tish jarayoni yorlig'ini qo'shadi.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: An advertising campaign can attract an increased number of visitors to your online store. This will likely be followed by an increase in customer accounts and profit margins, which will depend on customer "quality." Well-targeted advertising is typically more effective than large-scale advertising... and it's cheaper too!
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Reklama kampaniyasi sizning onlayn-do'koningizga tashrif buyuruvchilarning ko'payishi mumkin.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Design and user-friendliness are more important than ever in the world of online sales. An ill-chosen or hard-to-follow graphical theme can keep shoppers at bay. This means that you should aspire to find the right balance between beauty and functionality for your online store.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Dizayn va foydalanuvchi do'stlik onlayn savdo dunyosidagidan ham muhimroqdir.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Here is a summary of what may affect the creation of customer accounts:
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Mijozlarning hisobvaraqlarini yaratishga nima ta'sir qilishi mumkinligi haqida qisqacha ma'lumot.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: How to act on the registrations' evolution?
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Ro'yxatdan o'tishning evolyutsiyasida qanday harakat qilish kerak?

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: If you let your shop run without changing anything, the number of customer registrations should stay stable or show a slight decline.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Agar siz do'koningiz biron bir narsani o'zgartirmasdan ishlay olmasangiz, mijozlarni ro'yxatga olish soni barqaror qolishi yoki engil pasayish kerak.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Number of visitors who placed an order directly after registration:
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Ro'yxatdan o'tishdan keyin to'g'ridan-to'g'ri buyurtma bergan tashrif buyuruvchilarning soni:

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Number of visitors who stopped at the registering step:
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Ro'yxatdan o'tish bosqichida to'xtagan tashrif buyuruvchilar soni:

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: Specials, sales, promotions and/or contests typically demand a shoppers' attentions. Offering such things will not only keep your business lively, it will also increase traffic, build customer loyalty and genuinely change your current e-commerce philosophy.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Maxsus, sotish, aktsiyalar va / yoki tanlovlar odatda do'konlarning e'tiborini talab qiladi.

ns0:trans-unit.ns0:source: The total number of accounts created is not in itself important information. However, it is beneficial to analyze the number created over time. This will indicate whether or not things are on the right track.
ns0:trans-unit.ns0:target: Yaratilgan hisoblarning umumiy soni o'z-o'zidan muhim emas.
